string.name: arts
string.br: Email: hidayahrahman@usm.my (Norhidayah Abdul Rahman - Assistant Registrar)
D20 Building, opposite to CIMB Bank
Facilities includes Galeri Adiwarna which is an art exhibition gallery

string.name: biology
string.br: Five main research laboratories, namely, Plant Pathology Laboratory, Phytochemistry Laboratory, Biotechnology and Molecular Biology Laboratory, Microbiology Laboratory, and Fish Biology Laboratory.
Houses teaching laboratories for Plant Pathology, Microbiology and Biotechnology. Academic staff offices are located within the two buildings.
Supported by other facilities such as Electron Microscope Unit, Herbarium, Plant House and Fish House.

string.name: chemical
string.br: Dean email: r_adnan@usm.my (Profesor Dr. Rohana Binti Adnan)
The school occupies a four storey building which houses research and teaching facilities. An annex was recently added due to the expansion of analytical and industrial chemistry programs.

string.name: computer
string.br: USM is ranked within the top 100 universities in the world for Computer Science and Information Systems (QS World University Rankings, 2017).
Facilities include a lecture hall, 4 computer laboratories, 2 tutorial rooms with projector, 1 student selfe-serve cafe with 3 vending machines, 1 student lounge, 2 elevators and 1 viva room

string.name: communication
string.br: Facilities: Film and Broadcast, Persuasive Communication, Journalism

string.name: distedu
string.br: Dean: Associate Professor Dr. Zoraini Wati M Abas
Oldest distance education program at university level in Malaysia
